Uses of Class
application.CreditCard

    • Uses of CreditCard in application

      Methods in application that return CreditCard 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CreditCard Order.getCreditCard()
      This returns the Credit Card Object of this order The CreditCard Class holds the CC Number, CSV Number, CC Type, and Expiration Date.
      Methods in application with parameters of type CreditCard 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Order.setCreditCard(CreditCard cc)
      Mutator used to Change the Credit Card associated with this Order
      Constructors in application with parameters of type CreditCard 
      Constructor and Description
      Order(java.lang.String orderIdIn, java.util.ArrayList<Product> productsIn, double salesTotalIn, Address addressIn, CreditCard cc)
      This Constructs an order with a specified Order Id, A List of Products, Sales Total, Address Object, and a Credit Card Object.
